content: textured washcloth 2020 copyright designbcb textured washcloth about something so simple can be given for a number or gift giving opportunities housewarming make-up party hostess gifts reusable and sustainable a handcrafted washcloth will last a long time and give years of service that helps the planet and everything that depends on it for life this is a quick crochet with lots of texture in a little space it s shown in solid and variegated yarns but a short run self striping yarn would also be cool if you use a 100% cotton yarn you can expect over time for a little bit of shrinkage you can compensate for that if you wish by the number of chains you create in the first row of the pattern materials yarn lily sugar n cream 2 5 oz the variegated yarn is unknown and was in my stash 1 skein you will use a little over half a ball hook inoxal size 7 crochet hook gauge 5 stitches to the inch 20 row for 4 inches yarn needle for weaving in ends finished measurement approx 8x8 for help write me at designbcb@beverlybochenek com 2020 copyright designbcb textured washcloth pattern textured washcloth 1 chain 30 33 stitches measure your chain to get to 8 inches 2 single_crochet across row chain 1 turn 3 in the second chain from hook *single_crochet half_double_crochet bk loop repeat those two stitches to the last stitch place last stitch in edge stitch ch1 turn 4 2nd chain from hook if it s a single_crochet then do half_double_crochet bk loop if it s the half_double_crochet do a single_crochet work the opposite stitch you can tell if you re working into a half_double_crochet because it has 3 strands the single_crochet crochet has two repeat the two stitches to the last stitch ch1 turn 5 repeat row 3-4 til you have almost 8 inches 6 single_crochet across row 7 cut off yarn and weave in both ends 2020 copyright designbcb textured washcloth the designing life thanks for purchasing this pattern the gift of knitting and crochet has been a blessing
